languages.text:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is a low-emission augur, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.

traits.locale_text:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
Due to lower emissions of this auger type, it makes voidship harder to target, effectively providing 15% additional evasion.

Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is the low-emission auger type, which makes it more difficult for the enemies to hit the voidship. Thus, the voidship gains +15% evasion.

Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is the low-emission auger type, which makes it more difficult for the enemies to hit the voidship. Thus, the voidship gains +15% evasion.

This is a low-emission auger, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.

Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is a low-emission auger, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.

languages.text:
Дает кораблю данные для прицеливания, предоставляющие шанс попадания 85% и шанс критического попадания 10%.
В корабль становится сложнее попасть благодаря низкому уровню выбросов. Уклонение увеличивается на 15%.

В корабль становится сложнее попасть благодаря низкому уровню выбросов. Уклонение увеличивается на 15%.

languages.text: Versorgt Raumschiffwaffen mit Zieldaten, die 85 % Trefferchance und 10 % kritische Trefferchance gewähren. Durch diesen emissionsarmen Augur ist das Raumschiff schwieriger zu treffen, wodurch sich sein {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}ausweichwert{/g} um +15 % erhöht.
languages.original_text:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is a low-emission augur, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.

traits.locale_text: Versorgt Raumschiffwaffen mit Zieldaten, die 85 % Trefferchance und 10 % kritische Trefferchance gewähren.Durch diesen emissionsarmen Augur ist das Raumschiff schwieriger zu treffen, wodurch sich sein {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}ausweichwert{/g} um +15 % erhöht.

languages.text:
Fournit des données de ciblage aux armes des vaisseaux spatiaux, ce qui leur confère 85 % de chances de toucher et 10 % de coup critique.
Scrutateur à faible émission qui augmente l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} du vaisseau de +15 % et le rend plus difficile à toucher.
languages.original_text:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is a low-emission augur, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.

traits.locale_text:
Fournit des données de ciblage aux armes des vaisseaux spatiaux, ce qui leur confère 85 % de chances d'infliger un coup et 10 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique.
Scrutateur à faible émission qui augmente l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} du vaisseau de +15 % et le rend plus difficile à toucher.

Fournit des données de ciblage aux armes des vaisseaux spatiaux, ce qui leur confère 85 % de chances d'infliger un coup et 10 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique.
Scrutateur à faible émission qui augmente l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} du vaisseau de +15 % et le rend plus difficile à toucher.

languages.text:
Proporciona datos de puntería a las armas de la nave del vacío, otorgándoles un 85 % de probabilidad de impacto y un 10 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico.
Es un augur con emisiones de baja frecuencia que hace que la nave del vacío sea más difícil de impactar, aumentando su {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} en un +15 %.
languages.original_text:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is a low-emission augur, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.

traits.locale_text:
Proporciona datos de puntería a las armas de la nave del vacío, otorgándoles un 85 % de probabilidad de impacto y un 10 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico.

languages.text:
ボイドシップの武器に照準データを与え、85%の命中率と10%のクリティカルヒット率を与える。
このスキャナーは低エミッションで、ヴォイドシップに敵の攻撃が当たりづらくなり、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}が+15%増加する。
languages.original_text:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is a low-emission auger, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.

traits.locale_text:
ボイドシップの武器に照準データを与え、85%の命中率と10%のクリティカルヒット率を与える。
このスキャナーは低エミッションで、ヴォイドシップに敵の攻撃が当たりづらくなり、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}が+15%増加する。

languages.text:
可为虚空舰的武器提供瞄准数据，让所有武器获得85%命中率与10%暴击率。
这种低功耗的俄歇矩阵可以让舰船变得更加难以瞄准，可使虚空舰的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}提高15%。

languages.text:
Uçsuz gemisi silahlarına hedefleme verisi sağlayarak %85 vuruş olasılığı ve %10 kritik vuruş olasılığı kazandırır.
Düşük salınımlı bir alamet oluşundan dolayı uçsuz gemisinin {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değerini +%15 artırarak düşmanlar tarafından vurulmasını daha zor hâle getirir.
